## gcloud.CloudRunProps.memory property

Memory allocated to this deployment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
memory: string | number;
```

## Remarks

This is a Kubernetes style string. 128Mi is 128 Mibibytes, etc.

Please look at Google's Cloud Run documentation for more information and any restrictions vs. Kubernetes.
